mil7.6.9:1.1: “Bhante nagasena, ‘sappassa tini angani gahetabbani’ti yam vadesi, katamani tani tini angani gahetabbani”ti?
mil7.6.9:1.3: evameva kho, maharaja, yogina yogavacarena pannaya caritabbam, pannaya caramanassa kho, maharaja, yogino cittam naye carati, vilakkhanam vivajjeti, salakkhanam bhaveti.
mil7.6.9:1.4: Idam, maharaja, sappassa pathamam angam gahetabbam.
mil7.6.9:2.1: Puna caparam, maharaja, sappo caramano osadham parivajjento carati;
mil7.6.9:2.2: evameva kho, maharaja, yogina yogavacarena duccaritam parivajjentena caritabbam.
mil7.6.9:2.3: Idam, maharaja, sappassa dutiyam angam gahetabbam.
mil7.6.9:3.1: Puna caparam, maharaja, sappo manusse disva tappati socati cintayati;
mil7.6.9:3.2: evameva kho, maharaja, yogina yogavacarena kuvitakke, vitakketva aratim uppadayitva tappitabbam socitabbam cintayitabbam ‘pamadena me divaso vitinamito, na so puna sakka laddhun’ti.
mil7.6.9:3.3: Idam, maharaja, sappassa tatiyam angam gahetabbam.
mil7.6.9:3.4: Bhasitampetam, maharaja, bhagavata bhallatiyajatake dvinnam kinnaranam—
